short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IST helper for every student in need, for now it helps you with an auto-login in fenix, later it will have more features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For now it helps you with an auto-login in fenix, later it will have more features like direct link to the UCs pages, direct link to drives and news tab for each UC.
